I find funny how people still believes that for it to be NTR the characters must be in a relationship. Newsflash. There's a reason why cheating and NTR are separete tags. NTR means a loved one is being taken from someone, it can be your mother, your sister, a crush, even an unrequited love. That's not even taking acount to the different sub-genre like Netori, Netorase, etc.
